settings.description: اختر التاريخ والوقت لعدّاد عروض الصناديق. اتركه فارغاً لاستخدام مؤقت افتراضي.

settings.label: نص وصفي
settings.value: We handpick premium tech accessories into ready-to-go boxes so you stay connected, productive, and inspired.

settings.label: نص قصير تحت الشعار
settings.value: Needs Boxes – ready-to-use tech gifts in every delivery

value.items.title: Smart curation
value.items.text: We design each box around real daily-use scenarios.

value.items.title: Needs Boxes guarantee
value.items.text: Seven-day exchange or return if the box is not the right fit.

value.items.title: Trusted brands
value.items.text: We partner with licensed suppliers to ensure original products.

value.items.title: Dedicated support
value.items.text: Our advisors help before, during, and after every delivery.

settings.label: وصف العروض
settings.value: Grab limited-time Needs Boxes bundles with priority shipping across Saudi Arabia.

settings.label: وصف القسم
settings.value: Pick the Needs Boxes bundle that matches your budget—core accessories plus thoughtful extras included.

settings.label: وصف القسم
settings.value: Explore the newest curated boxes and filter by how and where you use your tech.

settings.label: وصف القسم
settings.value: Real stories from people unboxing tech kits tailored to their daily routines.

value.items.name: Abdullah – Riyadh
value.items.text: The workspace box arrived fully loaded—multi-port charger, spare headphones, and desk organizers. Saved me the hunt.

value.items.name: Sarah – Jeddah
value.items.text: Sent it as a gift and the packaging was stunning. Each item came with a guidecard, which made it extra special.

value.items.name: Mohammed – Dammam
value.items.text: Loved the travel tech mix. Support helped me tweak the add-ons for my trip within minutes.

settings.label: عنوان القسم
settings.value: Most asked questions about Needs Boxes

value.items.question: Can I customize the box contents?
value.items.answer: Absolutely. Choose a box then reach out to add or remove accessories before it ships—we’ll tailor it to your routine.

value.items.question: Are all items authentic?
value.items.answer: Yes. We source directly from authorized distributors and include warranty details inside every box.

value.items.question: How fast do you deliver in Saudi Arabia?
value.items.answer: Priority delivery lands within 24–72 hours depending on your city, with live tracking in your dashboard.

settings.label: عنوان القسم
settings.value: We’ll match you with the right box

settings.label: وصف القسم
settings.value: Reach out on any channel and the Needs Boxes crew will help you curate, customize, or track your order.

settings.label: وصف نموذج التواصل
settings.value: Send us a note and a Needs Boxes specialist will respond during business hours.

settings.label: وصف الواتساب
settings.value: Available daily from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.

settings.label: تثبت القائمة الرئيسية أعلى الصفحة عند التمرير لأسفل
settings.description: يُنصح بالغاء تفعيلها في حالة وجود عناصر كثيرة في القائمة المنسدلة
